headline: Constellation Brands (STZ): Assessing Whether Shares Offer Value After a Year of Weak Performance
summary: Constellation Brands (STZ) shares have moved only slightly over the month, reflecting a steadier trend in the absence of headline-making announcements or major market events. Investors appear to be watching broader industry factors for cues. See our latest analysis for Constellation Brands. Looking at the bigger picture, Constellation Brands’ share price has struggled to regain momentum this year, with a notable 5.5% uptick over the past month but a sharp 36.9% share price decline...
